docker-login-config: <MUST_REPLACE: Location of docker login config tar>
caf-audit-management-service-database-ur: <MUST_REPLACE: Vertica database connection string URL, e.g. jdbc:vertica://192.168.56.30:5433/CAFAudit >
caf-audit-management-service-database-se: <MUST_REPLACE: Vertica database service account username, e.g. caf-audit-service >
caf-audit-management-service-database-lo: <MUST_REPLACE: Vertica database loader account username, e.g. caf-audit-loader >
caf-audit-management-service-database-re: <MUST_REPLACE: Vertica database reader role, e.g. caf-audit-read >
caf-audit-management-service-kafka-broke: <MUST_REPLACE: The address of the Kafka broker. e.g. 192.168.56.20:9092 >
caf-audit-management-service-cli-image: <MUST_REPLACE: Docker image that contains the Audit Management Utility. e.g. rh7-artifactory.hpswlabs.hp.com:8443/caf/audit:1.0 >
